name: Phantom Form
description: This extension will open a web form for submitting artifacts to Phantom for investigation
content_security_policy: default-src *;   script-src 'self' 'sha256-/Aa661/kPHgWF0NqWyjKLmIea6w/scTnQWj6A3UFYCk=';   style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';   img-src 'self' data: chrome: filesystem:;   connect-src 'self' http: https: chrome-extension:;
